text: Beijing's authorities have canceled New

identified in being put into lockdown

this has not something they have advised

is in a virtual lockdown in this city of

all public transport has been closed the

quiet
normally the Lunar New Year rush would

I'm confident that our government has

wait hours to see a doctor you can
